text:
(1) Brighton Beach Boardwalk
(Reigelmann Boardwalk) north side, west of East 4th Street, showing in the foreground a depot used by the Seaview Railway ? at one time. All bungalows in this view were demolished prior to 1929.

December 1923.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(2) The same, a further view.

November 1924.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(3) The same, showing the Parkway Baths in the distance.

November 1924.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(4) The same, showing the Parkway restaurant.

July 1924.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

East 4th Street, east side, north from Reigelmann Boardwalk. A view of the Miramar apartments.

August 12, 1929.
